author: hollowstrawberry
description: A couple fun image filters for your friends' avatars. Also includes an avatar context menu.
install_msg:
üñåÔ∏è __**Draw**__ ```Cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load draw
2. View commands with [p]help Draw
3a. Optionally, enable slash commands with [p]slash enablecog draw
  3b. Sync slash commands with [p]slash sync
  3c. You may need to restart Discord to see the new commands.```
short: Fun image filters and an avatar context menu.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
